body:
Successfully installs on macOS 10.14.6 with Clang 10.0.1.

The import unit tests fail, and `libkml` doesn't seem to be RPATHed correctly. Opened up an issue [upstream](https://github.com/OSGeo/gdal/issues/1840) but if anyone knows why RPATH isn't working let me know. For now, `DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH` needs to be set to import `osgeo`.

Tested by converting an MKL file to a Shapefile.
title: GDAL: Add support for MKL driver
